text: For all BNPL transactions globally , the system shall , in compliance with CFPB Reg Z and EU PSD2 , assess a late fee calculated as max(USD 5 , 3 % of the overdue principal ) , with any fractional cent rounded up ; log all such fee calculations in the txn_fees table with fee_origin='BNPL_LATE ' ; and ensure that the feature flag late_fee_v2 is enabled in production by 23:59 UTC tonight , with an audit trail .
